com.mapdigit.drawing

Class Brush

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.drawing.Brush
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearGradientBrush, RadialGradientBrush, SolidBrush, TextureBrush

    public abstract class Brush
extends java.lang.Object
    Classes derived from this abstract base class define objects used to fill the interiors of graphical shapes such as rectangles, ellipses, pies, polygons, and paths.
    © Copyright 2010 Guidebee Pty Ltd.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NO_CYCLE
      Use the terminal colors to fill the remaining area.
      static int REFLECT
      Cycle the gradient colors start-to-end, end-to-start to fill the remaining area.
      static int REPEAT
      Cycle the gradient colors start-to-end, start-to-end to fill the remaining area.

      Set the matrix for this brush.

        public abstract int getTransparency()
